seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Senior Data Engineer II' with 5+ years experience required and technical leadership responsibilities including mentoring and code reviews

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Senior Data Engineer II' with core focus on data pipelines, data architecture, ETL tools (Fivetran, DBT), and data modeling frameworks

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions both 'real-time and batch data integrations', 'streaming platforms' as bonus, and 'reverse ETL workflows' - indicating hybrid batch/streaming approach with ML integration

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentions 'mentor junior engineers', 'code reviews', 'technical leadership through writing documentation' but no mention of direct reports or people management

primary_cloud.evidence: Mentions both AWS services (SageMaker, Redshift) and GCP services (Vertex AI) with no clear primary cloud preference

secondary_clouds.evidence: Both AWS (SageMaker, Redshift) and GCP (Vertex AI) mentioned, indicating multi-cloud environment

processing_paradigm.evidence: Explicitly mentions 'real-time and batch data integrations' and 'streaming platforms' as bonus, indicating both batch and streaming processing

orchestrator_category.evidence: Mentions CI/CD automation and ML workflows using SageMaker/Vertex AI, suggesting cloud-native orchestration patterns even though specific tools not named

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions Redshift and PostgreSQL as analytical databases, with focus on data warehousing patterns rather than data lake approaches

remote_restriction.evidence: Remote position but restricted to specific US states listed, requiring US residency

timezone_focus.evidence: Remote work across all US time zones mentioned, indicating Americas focus rather than global

relocation_required.evidence: Position is fully remote with no mention of relocation requirements, only state residency restrictions

h1b_friendly.evidence: Explicitly states 'ActBlue is unable to sponsor work visas at this time'

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship available and work authorization required, implying no support for student visa holders

citizenship_required.evidence: Requires work authorization but no citizenship requirement mentioned, allowing permanent residents and other authorized workers

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time, salaried position with comprehensive benefits package indicates W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: Extensive benefits including unlimited PTO, fully paid health insurance, 401k matching, parental leave, home office allowance, and additional perks

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions technical leadership and mentoring opportunities but no specific career tracks or promotion ladders mentioned

mentorship_signals.evidence: Explicitly mentions 'mentor junior engineers' as a responsibility

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion opportunities, advancement paths, or career progression

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring different roles within the organization

career_tracks_available.evidence: Technical leadership role focused on individual contributor path with mentoring responsibilities, no management track mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have skills (Python, SQL, 5+ years) and nice-to-have skills (TensorFlow, streaming platforms), balanced requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description clearly defining data engineering responsibilities, single clear role without multi-role hybrid elements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skill requirements (Python, SQL, 5+ years) are appropriate and realistic for senior data engineer level, no unrealistic combinations
